<0>The difference in final placement (1s: <0>The difference in final placement (1st–8th) between players who played a plain copy of the minion and players who did not.</0><1>For example, if</1><2>- Players who play a copy place 4th</2><3>- Players who do not play it place 5th</3><4>It would mean playing it improves the final placement by 1, and therefore has a Play Impact of '+1'.</4>

<0>The difference in final placement (1st–8th) between players who played a golden copy of the minion and players who did not.</0><1>For example, if</1><2>- Players who play a copy place 4th</2><3>- Players who do not play it place 5th</3><4>It would mean playing it improves the final placement by 1, and therefore has a Play Impact of '+1'.</4>

Percent of the time combat is won, when: Percent of the time combat is won, when at least one plain copy of the minion is on the board. Ties are excluded.
Percent of the time at least one plain c: Percent of the time at least one plain copy of the minion is on the board during combat.
Percent of the time combat is won, when: Percent of the time combat is won, when at least one golden copy of the minion is on the board. Ties are excluded.
Percent of the time at least one golden: Percent of the time at least one golden copy of the minion is on the board during combat.

<0>Position Impact is the difference in: <0>Position Impact is the difference in average final placement (1st–8th) between players who place {minionName} in that position and players who do not.</0><1>Note: When a very low popularity position has an unexpectedly high impact, players most likely had a specific reason to place a minion in that position. Have you ever wondered whether you're ta: Have you ever wondered whether you're taverning up too soon or waiting too long? This chart shows what tier the majority of winning players were at on a given turn.
Are you curious if Cave Hydra is best in: Bist du neugierig, ob Höhlenhydra an erster Stelle wirklich am besten positioniert ist? Wie wär's mit Maexxna? Das Positionierungsdiagramm wird dir zeigen, welche Stelle am beliebtesten ist und welche die höchste Gewinnrate aufweist.
See the performance of Heroes, Minions o: See the performance of Heroes, Minions or Compositions over the course of a game. Does the minion drop in winrate after turn 10? Maybe it’s time to sell it.
This chart will let you see how often a: This chart will let you see how often a minion is purchased, and how many copies are owned at the time. Is it a good idea to purchase that third Deflect-o-Bot? Check the stats to find out!
Keep track of your own performance in Ba: Keep track of your own performance in Battlegrounds with stats about your MMR over time, how you perform with each hero and composition, and how you compare to other players.
Learn how the available minion types in: Learn how the available minion types in your lobby can impact each hero's performance, so you can always pick the best one.

Tired of generic weekly snapshots? Find: Genug von generischen wöchentlichen Snapshots? Finde das beste Deck, welches du in deinem Rang und deiner Region spielen solltest, basierend auf den aktuellen Daten.

Find out what cards are having the most: Finde heraus, welche Karten den größten Einfluss in deinen Spielen haben! Sieh nach, ob deine Karten abschneiden wie du es erwartest.

HSReplay.net is entirely usable for free: HSReplay.net kann vollständig kostenlos benutzt werden! Auch wenn Premium die Existenz der Seite erhält musst du für die Verwendung nicht zahlen.
If your subscription was suspended, you: If your subscription was suspended, you can fix that by updating the payment details on <0>your billing page</0> and <1>contacting us</1>.<2></2>Learn more about suspended subscriptions on <3>this help page</3>.
<0>Wait!</0> Deleting your account will: <0>Warte!</0> Das Löschen deines Kontos setzt deine Statistiken zurzeit nicht zurück. Dies liegt daran, dass wir die Statistiken aller Spieler global erfassen.<2></2>Wenn du deine Aufzeichnungen löschen willst, kannst du das einfach <5>hier</5> tun.
If you're encountering issues, we want t: Falls du auf Probleme stößt, möchten wir davon erfahren. Du kannst uns <0>im Chat</0>, <1>per Email</1> oder <2>auf Discord</2> erreichen. Wir beantworten jede Nachricht.

We analyze games uploaded to HSReplay.ne: We analyze games uploaded to HSReplay.net to provide data for <2>HSReplay.net Premium</2> and sometimes publish findings in our <6>Articles</6>.<8></8><9>The data is always entirely anonymous and aggregate.</9>

Your replays will not appear in such lis: Deine Aufzeichnungen werden in keinen solchen Aufzählungen erscheinen. Dennoch wird jeder, dem du den Link zu einer bestimmten Aufzeichnung gibst, diese betrachten können.
Changing this option will only affect ne: Das Ändern dieser Einstellung wird nur neu hochgeladen Aufzeichnungen betreffen. Du kannst die Sichtbarkeit einer bestimmten Aufzeichnung jederzeit auf der Seite der Aufzeichnung ändern.
You can upload your collection using Hea: Du kannst deine Sammlung mittels Hearthstone Deck Tracker hochladen. Nach dem Hochladen deiner Sammlung werden wir dir deine persönlichen Staubkosten und fehlenden Karten anzeigen.

You may also make your collection availa: Weiterhin kannst du du deine Sammlung für andere Benutzer und Programme verfügbar machen.

<0>The difference in final placement (1s: <0>The difference in final placement (1st–8th) between players who played a copy of {minionName} on a given turn and players who did not.</0><1>For example, if</1><2>- Players who play {minionName} place 4th</2><3>- Players who do not play it place 5th</3><4>It would mean playing it improves the final placement by 1, and therefore has a Play Impact of '+1'.</4>
If the play impact goes negative, it mig: If the play impact goes negative, it might be too late to play {minionName}
If the Combat Winrate goes negative, it: If the Combat Winrate goes negative, it might be time to sell {minionName}

When second copies are purchased more th: Wenn die zweiten Exemplare häufiger gekauft werden als die dritten, ist das Verdreifachen wahrscheinlich ein Fehler
Percent of the time {minionName} is purc: Percent of the time {minionName} is purchased when offered by Bob, while players have zero, one, or two copies on the board.
When the discover rate is high, consider: When the discover rate is high, consider prioritizing this minion if it's offered in a Triple Reward.
Percent of the time players pick {minion: Percent of the time players pick {minionName}, when offered via Discover. Usually this is from a Triple Reward, but it also might be from a Primalfin Scout, Alexstraza's Hero Power, or any other Discover mechanic.
The popularity drops when players are se: The popularity drops when players are selling or tripling {minionName}
Percent of the time at least one copy of: Percent of the time at least one copy of {minionName} is on the board during combat.

To avoid issues with no data, make sure: To avoid issues with no data, make sure you’ve played games with <0>Hearthstone Deck Tracker</0>, that you’re viewing this page under the proper account (adjustable in the top right of this page), and that your time range contains games you’ve played while being a <0>Tier 7 subscriber</0>.
